name: Deberts Note
description:
We present you a convenient app for recording points for Deberts. No more papers, pens, sticks, and circles! All you need to play in Deberts is a deck of cards and Deberts Note! All the basic variations for different rules are thought out. Have a good game!

FEATURES:
-the ability to enter the names of players or teams;
-the ability to start the game not from the beginning (enter the desired number of points and bides to players);
-adjustable penalty points for the game without bribes;
-adjustable penalty points for a series of bides;
-adjustable length of a series of bides;
-the logic of the "hanging" bide is thought out;
-in the 2x2 mode, don't count bribes from both sides, just count the points of one team (for example, who scored less) and choose who played;
-for playing threesome, it's possible to choose to whom will be recorded points from bide;
-if you made a mistake while recording, then there is an opportunity to change the last distribution;
-you can always see the history of all hands.

Design by:
be.net/mayzzzzz

If you find an error in the logic or would like to see some of the rules that aren't implemented yet, then send letter with the topic DebertsNote here - ceo@nitrix.io
